constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: Condition 1 of planning permission 21/00426/HOU is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:S1816 - Pl101 - Proposed Site PlanS1816 - Pl102 - Proposed Ground FloorS1816 - Pl103 - Proposed First FloorS1816 - Pl104 - Proposed Second FloorS1816 - Pl105 - Proposed Roof PlanS1816 - Pl111 - Proposed North ElevationS1816 - Pl112 A - Proposed East ElevationS1816 - Pl113 A - Proposed South ElevationS1816 - Pl114 - Proposed West ElevationReason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 21/00426/HOU (Erection of part two/part single storey rear extension. Hip-to-gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 2no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion) dated 30/06/2021. Amendment to change proposed materials
